review: It took two to get one that worked. The problem was the unit on set up did not prompt me to enter the password for my Wi-Fi, which I immediately noticed when I got the replacement unit. One other thing, each remote is matched to the unit it comes with, didn't think it would matter but is seems to. I like it a lot more then using my PS3 to watch movies and there is just so much more with it. A good deal in my mind.

author: Jackdef

review: Easy install but you do have to purchase the HTML cable separately. The best functionality of Amazon Fire TV is with the $100 subscription to Amazon Prime. With Amazon Prime the TV movie, HBO series and the video music offerings are really impressive. The one complaint is that the batteries shipped with Amazon Fire TV for the remote quickly went dead after about two days of usage. Other batteries installed also went dead very quickly as well. There is no off and on switch on the remote or the little black box. Apparently the Amazon Fire TV is always on even if you are not viewing it. My current solution is to take the batteries out of the remote after each use and then reinstall them when using Amazon Fire again. Still trying to figure how to contact Amazon on this issue.
